data.question: What are the synthesis conditions for the formation of [Tl(OEt2)3][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2] (2a)?
data.answer: The synthesis conditions for the formation of [Tl(OEt2)3][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2] (2a) involve the addition of compound 1 to a solution of TlOEt in diethyl ether, followed by stirring overnight. The volatiles are then removed under vacuum to yield a sticky foam, which is washed repeatedly with light petroleum to give a fine white powder.

data.question: What is the role of hexamethylbenzene in the synthesis of [Tl(C6Me6)2][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2]·1.5(CH2Cl2) (5a)?

data.question: How does the coordination environment of thallium in [Tl(18-crown-6)][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2]·2CH2Cl2 (11b) differ from that in [Tl(toluene)3][H2N{B(C6F5)3}2] (4b)?
